sentences.en: A band of leftists took over the consulate.
sentences.cn: 一群左翼分子接管了领事馆.

sentences.en: A consulate consular official will also take your picture and your fingerprints.
sentences.cn: 领事馆工作人员还会获取你的照片和指纹.

sentences.en: Can you tell me the phone number of the consulate?
sentences.cn: 你能告诉我领事馆的电话号码 吗 ?

sentences.en: Consular invoices are declarations made at the consulate of the importing country.
sentences.cn: 领事发票是进口国领事馆签发的一种申报书.

sentences.en: During the spasm of alarm over Norway, he had once visited the Florence consulate.
sentences.cn: 在挪威引起的那场惊慌时, 他曾经找过佛罗伦萨领事馆.

sentences.en: It also maintains close liaison with local consulate officials.
sentences.cn: 该科也与本港各领事馆官员保持密切联络.

sentences.en: Please read it carefully before you leave the Consulate.
sentences.cn: 离开领事馆前,请详细阅读有关资料.

sentences.en: So they're still pressing us on the attack on the Consulate?
sentences.cn: 他们还在为攻击领事馆的事施压?

sentences.en: The consulate was upgraded to embassy status.
sentences.cn: 该领事馆已升格为大使馆.

sentences.en: The diplomat celebrated his appointment to the new consulate.
sentences.cn: 这名外交官庆祝自己被派到了新领事馆.

sentences.en: The document shall be legalized at the nearest consulate.
sentences.cn: 这些文件应在''.'就近'. ''领事馆得到认可.

sentences.en: The Spanish consulate is the large white building opposite the bank.
sentences.cn: 西班牙领事馆是银行对面的那栋高大的白色建筑物.

sentences.en: They managed to make contact with the British consulate in Lyons.
sentences.cn: 他们设法与英国驻里昂领事馆取得了联系。

sentences.en: You can also use the consulate building to trade resources for shipments.
sentences.cn: 你也可以盖领事馆为了卡片来交易资源.

sentences.en: Your visa has expired. Please and it renewed the consulate.
sentences.cn: 你的签证已过期,请去领事馆续期.
